help-file.title: "GOD, SETBIT"
help-file.content:
"Setbit" lets you set a variety of fields in rooms, doors, zones, objects, or characters. Be extremely careful in its usage.
Syntax:
setbit room room-number flag-type value [on|off] setbit char name flag-type value [on|off] setbit obj name flag-type value [on|off] setbit dir room-number flag-type value [on|off] setbit aff name[aff-number] flag value [on|off]
